mapper.sql: id, icon_url, `name`, link_url, is_status, indate_time, modified_time
mapper.select: select id, icon_url, `name`, link_url from home_business_entry where is_status = 1
mapper.update:
update home_business_entry
icon_url = #{iconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link_url = #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_status = #{isStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
indate_time = #{indateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
